resetPassword.title: Forgot Your Password?
resetPassword.details: Enter your username or email address and we will send you instructions on how to create a new password.
resetPassword.successMessage: You should receive an email shortly with further instructions.

register.title: Register
register.optionRegisterCompany: I am registering on behalf of a company
register.verify: You need to verify your email address to activate your account.
register.verifyInstructions: An email with instructions to verify your email address has been sent to your address.
register.inviteText: USERNAME invited you to join the Project PROJECTNAME
register.inviteVerification: Your all set to start! Login to to get to the project PROJECTNAME.

mfa.installOneOf: Install one of the following applications on your mobile:
mfa.openAndScan: Open the application and scan the barcode:
mfa.enterAndSave: Enter the one-time code provided by the application and click Save to finish the setup
mfa.enterDeviceName: Provide a Device Name to help you manage your OTP devices
mfa.name: Name
